title: Lucian Casting skills Fps Issues
body:
Since a time ago, i cant play with lucian, normally i have 150fps - 200 fps, but when i play lucian, and cast a skill, my fps drops to 25, how can i change that? Helpp meeeeeeee
Thank you for the time spending here ;)

replies.body: There may be an issue with your computer rendering graphics for Lucian and causing your fps to drop.  There are a list of steps you can take in our [FPS Issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)guide to fix this up.  I recommend updating your graphics drivers as a first step, and possibly running a repair which are also instructed in the guide.  Please let me know if you have any issues or questions!

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

This should solve your issue, let us know the results.
